name: Unbelievably Easy and Delicious Vegetarian Chili
author: Tracy Hamilton
summary: You're not going to believe how awesome this chili tastes and how easy it is to make. I make batches and take it to work for lunch for the week. It's really filling and very healthy. You can substitute the chili beans with kidney beans if you wish, but be sure to drain them if you do. It's even better the next day, and if you omit the optional cheese, it's vegan-friendly!
ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can diced tomatoes with juice
1 (15 ounce) can chili beans, with liquid
1 (1.25 ounce) package reduced sodium taco seasoning mix
directions: Mix the tomatoes, onion, white beans, chili beans,   mix, and ranch dressing mix in a large pot over medium heat
Reduce heat to low, mix in the burger crumbles, and continue cooking until heated through
